info.title: Changerawr API Documentation
info.description: The official documentation for the Changerawr API. rawr

get.description: List subscribers for a project with pagination and search functionality

post.description: Creates or updates a subscription for a user to receive email notifications for a project

get.description: Get current setup progress including team invitations

500.description: Internal Server Error

get.description: Retrieves changelog requests for the current user

400.description: Invalid input - Project name is required

post.description: Creates a new project and its associated changelog

Sets up an OAuth provider during initial system setup

get.description: Checks if the initial setup has been completed and provides setup state information
This endpoint only accepts POST requests for system configuration

delete.description: Safely deletes a user account by setting their references to NULL in related data. This preserves data integrity while removing the user from the system. Only admins can perform this action.

403.description: Unauthorized - Only admins can update users

get.description: Returns the details of an API key, including its name, last used date, created date, expiration date, revocation status, and permissions. Requires admin permissions.

patch.description: Updates an API key's name, revocation status, or expiration date. Requires admin permissions.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

get.description: Returns the details of a changelog entry by its ID, including its title, content, version, tags, and creation/update timestamps. Requires user authentication and permission to view the project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: - The ID of the project the entry belongs to.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: - The ID of the changelog entry to retrieve.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

put.description: Updates the title, content, version, and tags of a changelog entry by its ID. Requires user authentication and permission to edit the project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: - The ID of the project the entry belongs to.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: - The ID of the changelog entry to update.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

500.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

delete.description: Deletes a changelog entry if the user is an admin, or creates a deletion request if the user is staff. Requires user authentication and appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: - The ID of the project the entry belongs to.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: - The ID of the changelog entry to delete.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

patch.description: Updates the status (published/unpublished) of a changelog entry by its ID. Requires user authentication and permission to edit the project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: - The ID of the project the entry belongs to.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: - The ID of the changelog entry to update.
